title: {soils}
text:
{soils} is an R package for all your soil health data visualization and reporting needs. {soils} provides an RStudio project template to generate customized, interactive soil health reports. These reports include plots and tables to show how the participant’s results compare to simple averages of results from samples of the same crop, same county, and across the entire project.
For a no-code option, with less flexibility in content and aesthetic customization, see the Dirt Data Reports web app.

title: Dirt Data Reports
text:
Dirt Data Reports is a web-based tool that makes it easy for anyone to upload their soil sampling data, enter project-specific information, and generate customized, research-based soil health reports to make farmers’ soil health data accessible and actionable.
For more flexibility in content and aesthetic customization, see the {soils} R package. This will require coding in R and using Quarto.

title: WaSHI Tool Gallery
text:
The Washington Soil Health Initiative (WaSHI) Tool Gallery is a “one-stop-shop” for web applications, calculators, and R packages developed to support science-based technical assistance for healthy soils.
Each tile below links to a dedicated page with direct access to the tool, source code, and related blog posts – offering a central place to explore and share the tools advancing soil health in Washington.
